text: “Choncho lunjika nkhope yako ku chipembedzo moyenera; (pewa kusokera kwa okana Allah. Dzikakamize ku) chilengedwe chimene Allah adalengera anthu. (Ichi nchipembedzo cha Chisilamu chomwe nchoyenerana ndi chilengedwe cha munthu). Palibe kusintha m’kalengedwe ka zolengedwa za Allah. Ichi ndi chipembedzo choona (cholungama). Koma anthu ambiri sadziwa
